argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_pnfxr | |- +oo e. RR* |
| 2 |  | #P_xrlenlt | |- ( ( +oo e. RR* /\ A e. RR* ) -> ( +oo <_ A <-> -. A < +oo ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_mpan | |- ( A e. RR* -> ( +oo <_ A <-> -. A < +oo ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_nltpnft | |- ( A e. RR* -> ( A = +oo <-> -. A < +oo ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_bitr4d | |- ( A e. RR* -> ( +oo <_ A <-> A = +oo ) ) |
